protocol.name: P-G18007-1
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown on MS3 medium under 12-hour light:12-hour dark (LD) cycles for 12 days.

protocol.name: P-G18007-2
protocol.text: Samples were collected at Zeitgeber Time 15 (ZT15).

protocol.name: P-G18007-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 1 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual Rev. 3, 2005, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G18007-4
text: ) was used for data processing with the gcRMA algorythm for normalization. Differentially expressed genes were identified using the empirical Bayes moderated t statistics from the LiMMA package. Genes with an FDR < 5% were selected as misregulated in TOC1-ox

protocol.name: P-G18007-5
protocol.text: Total RNA extractions were performed with Pure Link Total RNA Purification System (Invitrogen).
